name: Lunar Rover Racing
description:
This was my first game using unreal engine, it has been fully programmed in c++ with no blueprints and has advanced features such as an AI driver that will automatically drive around the course.

For more details please view this presentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/18y6nDL_Gk74fQce2yi02o-Uu0NvafPKx/view?usp=shari...
